attributes.action: Respect Jewish cultural and religious right of killing animals without stunning
attributes.additional_details: It is unjust and unfair and inhuman to discriminate against a minority community where that community has religious and cultural obligations that it has no choice but to respect as it believes that it is a command of God. Other communities should respect that and defend the minority communities as this would strenthen society and bring it immense benefit and not fall to the prejudice of other misguided or prejudiced minorities or even majorities. There are a lot of vocal groups who have enormous power that even the Queen warned us of evil forces in operation in this country against which we must stand in unity  It is not incumbent on the government or the media to carry out hidden agendas agains any community either.
